report.title: NBN Exchange format
report.description: An extract of records in a format suitable for creating NBN Exchange format files in combination with the nbn output format.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id left join locations vc on vc.id=o.location_id_vice_county and vc.deleted=false join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and (#ownData#=0 or CAST(o.created_by_id as character varying)='#currentUser#') and (snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' or snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osie' or snf.entered_sref_system = '4326' or snf.entered_sref_system = '27700') and quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true and o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null and st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) between -14 and 13 and st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) between 48 and 62

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' or o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' or o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null then 'F' else 'T' end

column.name: gridreference
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then null else replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: east
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: north
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case upper(snf.entered_sref_system) when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' when 'OSIE' then 'OSI' else upper(snf.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end
